title: This is the furry art I like
body:
http://i.imgur.com/47WGRQt.png[/img] 

Something just so nice about it.  It doesn't have to be a fetish, rather just another way to draw someone.  

But yea a lot of it is fucking weird yiff garbage lmfao #killallfurries2015

Downvoting because it's furry art even though t's a very clean and talented drawing.  No appreciation for art, smh.  Peasants.
